plot: The film portrays the grief of a father whose soldier son was killed in the war in Iraq. His grief is so intense and overwhelming that he actually imagines his son coming home from the war....
title: Iraq
plot_es: The film portrays the grief of a father whose soldier son was killed in the war in Iraq. His grief is so intense and overwhelming that he actually imagines his son coming home from the war....
